definitions.definition: Cloudy diffused matter such as mist , steam or fumes suspended in the air .
The gaseous state of a substance that is normally a solid or liquid .
Something insubstantial , fleeting , or transitory ; unreal fancy ; vain imagination ; idle talk ; boasting .
Any medicinal agent designed for administration in the form of inhaled vapour.
Hypochondria ; melancholy ; the blues ; hysteria , or other nervous disorder.

main_definition: Cloudy diffused matter such as mist , steam or fumes suspended in the air .
secondary_definitions: The gaseous state of a substance that is normally a solid or liquid .
( idiomatic ) Something insubstantial , fleeting , or transitory ; unreal fancy ; vain imagination ; idle talk ; boasting .
( dated ) Any medicinal agent designed for administration in the form of inhaled vapour.
( archaic , in the plural ) Hypochondria ; melancholy ; the blues ; hysteria , or other nervous disorder.
